## 

<span key="c39cb05bb0b74872b87b6f4c860eb008"><span offset-key="c39cb05bb0b74872b87b6f4c860eb008:0">üëãüèª Behavioral & Cultural Interview Questions</span></span>

> <span key="4e6b6b38bff940e180d00b2e855da343">*Software engineer interviewers ask behavioral/cultural questions to evaluate interviewee‚Äôs soft skills, and also to decide whether the candidate is a cultural fit. Make sure you‚Äôve prepared great answers to these interview questions.*</span>

> <span key="75bb4c2f70164fff8ba972c55de508e2">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="75bb4c2f70164fff8ba972c55de508e2:1">Tell me about yourself</span></span>

> <span key="bf544b59818548d99ef439134a46eae3">***‚ö´====>***<span offset-key="bf544b59818548d99ef439134a46eae3:1">‚ÄúTell me about yourself‚Äù is one of the most common and important interview questions. However, it can be daunting, as it‚Äôs one you need to get right. After all, not only is it your first impression on the interviewer, but you also need to be simultaneously professional and authentic when answering it.</span></span>

> <span key="c5b3de85e497412cb94f4dfa6c273084">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="c5b3de85e497412cb94f4dfa6c273084:1">So how can you give a good answer without oversharing? To help you structure your answer, we‚Äôll give you a rough guideline: start with a short introduction, talk about the present, recount the past, and mention your future goals.</span></span>

<span key="0f2abda3f5c247cdaa69a93091468ad2"><span offset-key="0f2abda3f5c247cdaa69a93091468ad2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="f6049a640f5945609d4a36ac1460bd8e"></span>

<span key="9ed2394d35f24dc2bdcf189f99da8754"><span offset-key="9ed2394d35f24dc2bdcf189f99da8754:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span>

<span key="9b1676fb890148c39b55d6e94c43a2f5"><span offset-key="9b1676fb890148c39b55d6e94c43a2f5:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="48fcf503bbaf4a21ac18d63145b4ccb6"><span offset-key="48fcf503bbaf4a21ac18d63145b4ccb6:0">What are some side projects you‚Äôre currently working on?</span></span>

<span key="70720d811e6c45939b0181cec5259cc6">*Current Experience*</span>

> <span key="f6c98553a90d4c4996f4ab7e31184c70">***‚ö´****\*\*Outline the role you‚Äôre currently in, your responsibilities, and your achievements (without reciting your resume)*</span>

> <span key="15632768e379492ab4e7cdd006628c8e">***‚ö´****\*\*Highlight what you‚Äôre most passionate about (i.e. working with PMs to perfect product specs, discussing with colleagues about different tech stacks, helping others excel in their jobs and career)*</span>

> <span key="61c279340dcf4c769bba255494afbeea">***‚ö´****\*\*Recount one or two job-related projects and/or situations that map onto the job you‚Äôre applying to (i.e. collaborating with designers, working with legacy code, implementing best-practices, introducing new tech stacks, mentoring your colleagues)*</span>

## 

<span key="474e26d7dbef408f879ed106422f1990"><span offset-key="474e26d7dbef408f879ed106422f1990:0">Past Experience</span></span>

> <span key="3878cf4f9fb343f5ab6c85dd023743d5">**Now it‚Äôs time to highlight your skills a little:**</span>

> <span key="405c2e6143e5460199f9b08a38650160">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="405c2e6143e5460199f9b08a38650160:1">Selectively highlight one high-impact (preferably quantifiable) project you were involved with for each job</span></span>

> <span key="f64338dd7cbe48c889afb5be42fc44d7">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="f64338dd7cbe48c889afb5be42fc44d7:1">Highlight the hard and soft skills you learned from your past working experiences</span></span>

> <span key="636a747cc5f44a9580da0def575e5868">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="636a747cc5f44a9580da0def575e5868:1">Emphasize the initiatives you took to improve the company‚Äôs work flow (i.e. propose new flow to streamline sprints) or your own skillsets (i.e. engaging in hackathon with colleagues or friends)</span></span>

## 

<span key="129ab2247596429f8101dac9c85e3e40"><span offset-key="129ab2247596429f8101dac9c85e3e40:0">Future Expectations</span></span>

> <span key="3e9f1352dd7c417ba43ddb85a0c10aa7">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="3e9f1352dd7c417ba43ddb85a0c10aa7:1">Convey what you hope to achieve and learn from the new job</span></span>

> <span key="d1e47e3aeda44220a74ca42db4c26312">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="d1e47e3aeda44220a74ca42db4c26312:1">Detail products, projects, features, or initiatives you can imagine yourself help kick off and lead in the company</span></span>

> <span key="0264b14b375b4d5396cdc6aea7545aaf">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="0264b14b375b4d5396cdc6aea7545aaf:1">Tell me what a productive day at work looks like to you</span></span>

> <span key="c741ad752a9b4a2898c692bc962056cb">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="c741ad752a9b4a2898c692bc962056cb:1">This question may not appear in every interview, but when they do, it‚Äôs important for you to highlight your organizational and prioritization skills. When hiring managers ask this question, they want to know:</span></span>

> <span key="8564c975e45c408b8e87f2bcb2296aa7">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="8564c975e45c408b8e87f2bcb2296aa7:1">Whether you‚Äôre a proactive communicator and a good planner of your time</span></span>

## 

<span key="ecd1e689b2e3436580931f918f54298f"><span offset-key="ecd1e689b2e3436580931f918f54298f:0">How you strike a balance between multiple ongoing projects</span></span>

<span key="125e42f2809443a1b41d684a3002e904"><span offset-key="125e42f2809443a1b41d684a3002e904:0">D</span>***escribe one or two instances where you had several projects running simultaneously and how you managed to prioritize different tasks, make progress, meet milestones, and work on iterations based on feedback.***</span>

> <span key="be7e133ce41541b082a3d74ca19205ac">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="be7e133ce41541b082a3d74ca19205ac:1">How you deliver quality work with limited time</span></span>

> <span key="247a90e1e1704a66b3359ca8f1d42196">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="247a90e1e1704a66b3359ca8f1d42196:1">When there‚Äôs limited time and multiple projects going on, you may not be able to give 100% to the projects at hand. Let the interviewers know:</span></span>

> <span key="4fff7912bb664396a6d91211d012750b">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="4fff7912bb664396a6d91211d012750b:1">How you decide which tasks should be prioritized</span></span>

> <span key="e83ac97c3372405884fe6726870b3459">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="e83ac97c3372405884fe6726870b3459:1">How you negotiate deadlines and milestones with stakeholders</span></span>

> <span key="704063555dce4e95abdc2fa0d2bb8c2b">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="704063555dce4e95abdc2fa0d2bb8c2b:1">How you ensure all projects will be delivered with acceptable quality</span></span>

> <span key="2088f1fc984042d48d81ecc7ad91f0aa">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="2088f1fc984042d48d81ecc7ad91f0aa:1">At what milestones you believe it‚Äôs ok to deliver something ‚Äúless than perfect‚Äù</span></span>

> <span key="7b55ee3e95504c239fd7e33530252c91">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="7b55ee3e95504c239fd7e33530252c91:1">How you decide when to go back and improve the ‚Äúminimum viable projects‚Äù delivered earlier in the project‚Äôs timeline</span></span>

## 

<span key="165a017078c54057860338a34cc87f04"><span offset-key="165a017078c54057860338a34cc87f04:0">Professional Skills</span></span>

> <span key="19ba333e02804d84972c131c3d1f78ca">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="19ba333e02804d84972c131c3d1f78ca:1">Will you excel in this job? Are you passionate about this job? It‚Äôs time to show how. For the first question, highlight some of your professional abilities:</span></span>

> <span key="766f15e33bdc4778b80982dbfbbf6dea">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="766f15e33bdc4778b80982dbfbbf6dea:1">Industry experience</span></span>

> <span key="dde8cde7d47f47e49df99a1dfe2cdc32">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="dde8cde7d47f47e49df99a1dfe2cdc32:1">Technical skills</span></span>

> <span key="2ca4faadb9384c0d82146700c44e284e">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="2ca4faadb9384c0d82146700c44e284e:1">Soft skills</span></span>

> <span key="8826787847a343ee9d90ae7e4b320e39">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="8826787847a343ee9d90ae7e4b320e39:1">Key accomplishments</span></span>

### 

<span key="2dc2ee16456745cfa8213ef9ed37a40f"><span offset-key="2dc2ee16456745cfa8213ef9ed37a40f:0">For the second question, showcase your excitement for the job. Hiring managers want to see your excitement for these reasons:</span></span>

> <span key="a882c4788a0c40e3b4efd2ec561c305f"><span offset-key="a882c4788a0c40e3b4efd2ec561c305f:0">\*\*\*‚ö´1>\*\*\*Excitement will fuel your performance</span></span>

> <span key="62344485de864c35aafb999a9e9a08ca"><span offset-key="62344485de864c35aafb999a9e9a08ca:0">\*\*\*‚ö´2>\*\*\*Passion will confirm that you‚Äôre interested in this job</span></span>

> <span key="0b9e67802ca24f7c870f29ec2b032194">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="0b9e67802ca24f7c870f29ec2b032194:1">Eagerness will help you get through challenges at work</span></span>

> <span key="4a7040b182ee495eaaa3520ab3daa4dc">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="4a7040b182ee495eaaa3520ab3daa4dc:1">Company culture and shared values</span></span>

> <span key="fccc0299a09d4e25aa9a77bdecaf9802">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="fccc0299a09d4e25aa9a77bdecaf9802:1">Do you know the company‚Äôs culture and will you be a good fit? Here are some culture-related points you could cover in your answer:</span></span>

> <span key="2f437addca184eaf9127003dba394261">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="2f437addca184eaf9127003dba394261:1">You‚Äôre attracted to the company‚Äôs general reputation</span></span>

> <span key="343cd483c8d14a4dafa8048cdc097bf4">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="343cd483c8d14a4dafa8048cdc097bf4:1">You‚Äôre inspired by a specific leader in the company</span></span>

> <span key="23026b5c07a04fcf892bd5a2d2a76257">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="23026b5c07a04fcf892bd5a2d2a76257:1">You‚Äôre passionate about the company‚Äôs products and services</span></span>

> <span key="06aa3405e22e46bc80ef5a1e65860585">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="06aa3405e22e46bc80ef5a1e65860585:1">You‚Äôre onboard with the company‚Äôs initiatives (community engagement, public endorsements, etc.)</span></span>

> <span key="9ea1c8e29b2246d18f4f07dfeec8989f">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="9ea1c8e29b2246d18f4f07dfeec8989f:1">You admire the company‚Äôs culture. Here are some specific examples:</span></span>

<span key="89a64cbc4ab0422fb4cb75fca4cc57ff"><span offset-key="89a64cbc4ab0422fb4cb75fca4cc57ff:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="d0f2d3551e8d41f487cf17b47fc0cdf2"><span offset-key="d0f2d3551e8d41f487cf17b47fc0cdf2:0">Commitment to the company</span></span>

> <span key="4b19cbd84eb844a89eaffe577bcee1d8">***‚ö´Are you passionate about the company and will you stay committed to this company? If the interviewer already asked you ‚ÄúWhere do you see yourself in 5 years?‚Äù then you don‚Äôt have to stress too much about showing your long-term commitment when answering this question. However, if you haven‚Äôt had the opportunity to show your commitment to the company, the most organic way to show your commitment is to talk about your long term plans in the company. Here are some things you can talk about:***</span>

> <span key="d2c4eeb3df884083bb60d44a96668b69">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="d2c4eeb3df884083bb60d44a96668b69:1">Projects you want to start</span></span>

> <span key="ee5b31c6dbc747cda869eb9658ab9861">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="ee5b31c6dbc747cda869eb9658ab9861:1">Potential directions you think the company can go in</span></span>

> <span key="a666421c22de4c33942bf9222e73b569">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="a666421c22de4c33942bf9222e73b569:1">The different products/teams you want to contribute to</span></span>

> <span key="ae178a36ee7b4556b839831974f3cbc1">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="ae178a36ee7b4556b839831974f3cbc1:1">Processes you‚Äôd like to participate in improving</span></span>

## 

<span key="135ec31fe7e643e09e727fa3098c1783"><span offset-key="135ec31fe7e643e09e727fa3098c1783:0">Why should we hire you?</span></span>

> <span key="a494b20c2c664b6c8ecb04e12bfa777f">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="a494b20c2c664b6c8ecb04e12bfa777f:1">Ultimately, every single question interviewers ask you is related to this overarching question: ‚ÄúWhy should we hire you?‚Äù Interviewers want to know, as confidently as possible, that you will be a good hire. Therefore, your answer should confirm that you‚Äôll be a good hire.</span></span>

> <span key="c3b5f0a0d0854c979c7ee38f320fa0d9">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="c3b5f0a0d0854c979c7ee38f320fa0d9:1">Unlike the more specific questions we‚Äôve outlined above, this question is a generic question that requires a concise but powerful answer. Think about this as your elevator pitch‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääyou should be able to sell yourself to the interview within a matter of minutes.</span></span>

> <span key="348d69a713ae47c299a4f77fdfc14fdb">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="348d69a713ae47c299a4f77fdfc14fdb:1">To come up with your elevator pitch, you‚Äôll need to do some planning and consolidation.</span></span>

> <span key="e14fbc4a600447c1b9aada258a79299e">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="e14fbc4a600447c1b9aada258a79299e:1">Here are some guiding questions for you to kickoff your brainstorming sessions:</span></span>

> <span key="653f1f142ae144dba9175b0955fcd22e">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="653f1f142ae144dba9175b0955fcd22e:1">What are the most important qualifications for this position from the company‚Äôs perspective?</span></span>

> <span key="e1265eaf3c6b49acb447ea639ca92a32">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="e1265eaf3c6b49acb447ea639ca92a32:1">What are my strong suits and how do they set me apart from others?</span></span>

> <span key="893e9d77ccce43d9853b3d1eee1ccf02">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="893e9d77ccce43d9853b3d1eee1ccf02:1">What are my most monumental accomplishments?</span></span>

> <span key="f85bad2b6cf74f69826b11915e544c3e">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="f85bad2b6cf74f69826b11915e544c3e:1">Why are you the best person for this job?</span></span>

> <span key="9633c7b80eae4c0e89046e66d887cf38">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="9633c7b80eae4c0e89046e66d887cf38:1">Consolidate and practice your pitch</span></span>

> <span key="40bfbaf7ff2e4abd91e70aa3c31a0469">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="40bfbaf7ff2e4abd91e70aa3c31a0469:1">Combine your answers in prose form to make sure each point flows to the next smoothly</span></span>

> <span key="a6fed0e7c9c741e3b5bc117bbc6cb1a9">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="a6fed0e7c9c741e3b5bc117bbc6cb1a9:1">Check to make sure your answer sets you apart from other candidates</span></span>

> <span key="4273ca1c0c074217a349426519a1cd0c"><span offset-key="4273ca1c0c074217a349426519a1cd0c:0">\*\*\*‚ö´!!!!!!!\*\*\*Practice, practice, and practice, but DO NOT TRY TO MEMORIZE YOUR PITCH!!!!!!!!!</span></span>

## 

<span key="d4e4b02332bf4542886a1a36b5e9543f"><span offset-key="d4e4b02332bf4542886a1a36b5e9543f:0">üìù Interview Etiquette & Other Tips</span></span>

<span key="da17de7ba914410a9556e7c9bf4ca700"><span offset-key="da17de7ba914410a9556e7c9bf4ca700:0">Nailing an interview takes more than just knowing how to answer common interview questions. You‚Äôll also need to prepare questions of your own, think about salary, and get your communications right. Here‚Äôs how.</span></span>

### 

<span key="203a926680d146d895523600eb014646"><span offset-key="203a926680d146d895523600eb014646:0">Questions to ask in an interview</span></span>

<span key="9681a12bb6b246bf8be81a35fb571a06"><span offset-key="9681a12bb6b246bf8be81a35fb571a06:0">‚ÆïAs the job seeker, it‚Äôs normal to feel like you‚Äôre being interrogated during interviews. However, at its core, an interview is a conversation, and should be a two-way interaction. As the interviewee, you need to stay engaged and ask thoughtful questions.</span></span>

<span key="c160cd326f0747b7ac569b7cad8c0773"><span offset-key="c160cd326f0747b7ac569b7cad8c0773:0">‚ÆïBy asking questions, you‚Äôre expressing your genuine curiosity towards the company. This helps companies know that you‚Äôre serious about them. Additionally, it also helps you evaluate whether the job and/or the company is really what you‚Äôre looking for.</span></span>

<span key="521d161c634a470089801c31ef6b0570"><span offset-key="521d161c634a470089801c31ef6b0570:0">‚ÆïThere are fantastic resources out there with more than a dozen questions you can ask interviewers. Here, we‚Äôll provide a few that we think are essential to help you gain deeper understandings about the role, company, and your future within the company:</span></span>

<span key="f5cb1e6029dd4c0aa55f3b9267f3af6c"><span offset-key="f5cb1e6029dd4c0aa55f3b9267f3af6c:0">‚ÆïThe job and cross-team communication</span></span>

<span key="4b42c7301dbc43a293c15082a0f26769"><span offset-key="4b42c7301dbc43a293c15082a0f26769:0">‚ÆïThe company‚Äôs values and working culture</span></span>

<span key="64cd2bf030394a1c983212642651a414"><span offset-key="64cd2bf030394a1c983212642651a414:0">‚ÆïWhat are some shared qualities and characteristics among your employees?</span></span>

<span key="b481ab75b6fd4a32b8608a7748ae7b0b"><span offset-key="b481ab75b6fd4a32b8608a7748ae7b0b:0">‚ÆïWhat‚Äôs your favorite part about working at the company?</span></span>

<span key="5f1eb33e2a104e10bce3fbc143c4ba36"><span offset-key="5f1eb33e2a104e10bce3fbc143c4ba36:0">‚ÆïWhat‚Äôs your least favorite part about working at the company?</span></span>

<span key="89b9788075874ef28bf48c1acec119d7"><span offset-key="89b9788075874ef28bf48c1acec119d7:0">Professional growth opportunities</span></span>

<span key="4357bf08afa4435ba0d9090569474187"><span offset-key="4357bf08afa4435ba0d9090569474187:0">‚ÆïAre there multiple product/service teams in the company? Can engineers apply to join a different team? What does the process look like?</span></span>

<span key="65befea6e34746cd9ba0b36ea2f3d123"><span offset-key="65befea6e34746cd9ba0b36ea2f3d123:0">‚ÆïAre there professional development courses and training available?</span></span>

<span key="f282758e182a4794bf625c1e3a724b76"><span offset-key="f282758e182a4794bf625c1e3a724b76:0">‚ÆïDo senior engineers and engineering leads usually get promoted from within the company?</span></span>

## 

<span key="844b80567fb543edbb0add1fbffc93dc"><span offset-key="844b80567fb543edbb0add1fbffc93dc:0">Closing questions and next steps</span></span>

> <span key="0fcdb7492b834941988b9fe5dcc1dafd">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="0fcdb7492b834941988b9fe5dcc1dafd:1">Is there anything unclear or concerning about my background that I can help clarify?</span></span>

> <span key="5333980d70144da4b146eb684c01456d">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="5333980d70144da4b146eb684c01456d:1">What are the next steps in the interview process?</span></span>

> <span key="768ed1225891453f91346ae0ab5eab78">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="768ed1225891453f91346ae0ab5eab78:1">Is there anything else I can provide you with that would be helpful?</span></span>

> <span key="4dc3fd9b65d044f58c3e64a06047204c">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="4dc3fd9b65d044f58c3e64a06047204c:1">How to answer salary expectations?</span></span>

> <span key="6aa94e7b77454888b1a7db2805c2a915">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="6aa94e7b77454888b1a7db2805c2a915:1">‚ÄúWhat are you salary expectations?‚Äù can be a daunting question. If talking about money wasn‚Äôt uncomfortable enough already, most job seekers worry that proposing the ‚Äúwrong number‚Äù would cost them the job‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääor land them a job offer with a disappointing salary. Not great.</span></span>

<span key="ffb0603ab1eb4664bdd558ba77319374"><span offset-key="ffb0603ab1eb4664bdd558ba77319374:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="890f4abf705e42f9b20e12e4cea7515b"><span offset-key="890f4abf705e42f9b20e12e4cea7515b:0">Follow up ?????</span></span>

> <span key="cdaf995b574e4d239655f654a307298f">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="cdaf995b574e4d239655f654a307298f:1">Depending on how many rounds of interviews you‚Äôve gone through, you may feel differently about how close you are to getting the job. The closer you get to the end of the hiring process, the more likely it is for you to start feeling anxious due to higher expectations. As a result, you may be eager to follow up with the hiring manager regarding your interview results. With that said, there‚Äôs a fine line between showing your eager attitude and coming off as desperate.</span></span>

> <span key="110c5452b9e54d2ab613e4c4bd96aa79">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="110c5452b9e54d2ab613e4c4bd96aa79:1">Before we get to the types of follow up emails you should send out, make sure to ask the hiring manager about when you can expect to hear back from them about next steps. This information will help you decide when it‚Äôs appropriate to follow up down the line.</span></span>

> <span key="e1feba9131c84524a2e6b23657892f07">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="e1feba9131c84524a2e6b23657892f07:1">There are four types of follow up emails you should send at different times after the interview: Thank you email, checking-in email, second follow up email, final follow up email.</span></span>

### 

<span key="0b81a891314e48f0927e36ae4edac477"><span offset-key="0b81a891314e48f0927e36ae4edac477:0">Thank you email</span></span>

<span key="e35a6d828d7a4d919570f5c33b1a42bf">**A thank you email should be sent out on the same day of the interview or one day after your interview. The main purpose of this email is to show your excitement and appreciation. This email should be short and sweet and should include:**</span>

### 

<span key="b5d57888e55841ba9835749441b8860c"><span offset-key="b5d57888e55841ba9835749441b8860c:0">A thank you note for their time</span></span>

<span key="330bc4e3d9ee4a468147579bdbc4d738"><span offset-key="330bc4e3d9ee4a468147579bdbc4d738:0">‚Æï</span>**A brief mention of the specific job you interviewed for**</span>

<span key="8b8a8a178dc449a7b63ba034bed64da5"><span offset-key="8b8a8a178dc449a7b63ba034bed64da5:0">‚Æï</span>**A brief note of what you found most impressive about the company**</span>

<span key="39ad62bc45524feaae3173c4e4281678"><span offset-key="39ad62bc45524feaae3173c4e4281678:0">‚Æï</span>**One or two things you learned about the organization**</span>

<span key="bbceb352af394dc5bc9920a3724b4946"><span offset-key="bbceb352af394dc5bc9920a3724b4946:0">‚Æï</span>**One sentence about how you‚Äôre excited you are to contribute in a specific way**</span>

<span key="574fccdf8e9d42b6982c370b779be270"><span offset-key="574fccdf8e9d42b6982c370b779be270:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span><span slate-void="true" key="b8f6507cc79a4ca78a24757fd8c4c588"></span>

<span key="e49bb9f89c1a48d0b5f9915c786b0d6f"><span offset-key="e49bb9f89c1a48d0b5f9915c786b0d6f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span>

<span key="1cd4795c19544ecfb2336ed35bbb7dac"><span offset-key="1cd4795c19544ecfb2336ed35bbb7dac:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="71912ff15e0a4e1d99587dbbb255b23f">***Technical interview :***</span>

### 

<span key="d559ff9b89484a548c44ab412db06d5b"><span offset-key="d559ff9b89484a548c44ab412db06d5b:0">‚Æï</span>***questions examine a candidate‚Äôs thought processes and assess what approaches they adopt to solve problems. The most common end-to-end software development questions are listed below.***</span>

## 

<span key="2001adb571524843a747c5a0b543f69a"><span offset-key="2001adb571524843a747c5a0b543f69a:0">Here‚Äôs the repo that I use to practice my technical chops for interviews:</span></span>

<span key="b3a47de60c0543ddb551ae1a69c516ed"><span offset-key="b3a47de60c0543ddb551ae1a69c516ed:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/bgoonz/INTERVIEW-PREP-COMPLETE" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d2aa1c5dc731401fb2327d42dd058c99" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-23437_259-23438-237__"><span data-key="b30e881f8fa84b5b8d2ec3acc4f051fe"><strong>bgoonz/INTERVIEW-PREP-COMPLETE</strong><span data-offset-key="b30e881f8fa84b5b8d2ec3acc4f051fe:1"> </span><em>Tech Interview Asymptotic Notation Data Structures Algorithms Algorithm Basics Search Algorithms Sorting Algorithms‚Ä¶</em><span data-offset-key="b30e881f8fa84b5b8d2ec3acc4f051fe:3">github.com</span></span></span></a><span key="f1f523475fc148b584223c8cb8057c13"><span offset-key="f1f523475fc148b584223c8cb8057c13:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="be230f1f9de444dd96434da00bbb2b79"><span offset-key="be230f1f9de444dd96434da00bbb2b79:0">1. Development</span></span>

> <span key="50172ea56ebc4c9284f55a0ebac0d0cd">***‚ö´Describe the process you used for a recent project, from requirements to delivery. Does your team prefer using Agile or Waterfall? Any pros and cons?***</span>

> <span key="5d5fc262321642a58604c4681751c5e1">***‚ö´ In answering this question, you need to show your planning, process, and communication/collaboration skills. Think in advance about a suitable project where your contributions cover all these bases.***</span>

> <span key="b06ae73ee3924b809e4894796e0e16fc">***‚ö´If you can, it‚Äôs best to choose to describe an Agile project you worked on, as organizations whether they use a Waterfall or Agile methodology, are keen to work with developers experienced in Agile.***</span>

> <span key="d6565689187d41d581f7ebd912e35854">***‚ö´ Ideally, share a project in which you worked with a bigger team.***</span>

> <span key="5e6aa9dab97648eaa1630ac2ff73a00d">***‚ö´ Outline the components of the project and what role you played.***</span>

> <span key="0ec58000e03341a68f56ff7f9e5c0219">***‚ö´ Highlight any interactions with other teams and the process for handover and collaboration.***</span>

> <span key="ab9e4553d3da46cb8fbb53ad5f5cf9fb">***‚ö´Highlight any interactions with other teams and the process for handover and collaboration.***</span>

## 

<span key="de73fe4d346e42129f84a19150e238b2"><span offset-key="de73fe4d346e42129f84a19150e238b2:0">2. Based on your experience in this project, specify your favorite and least favorite part of this type of collaboration.</span></span>

<span key="3d8ad1c5ae584cfe8807b2496e1d5d19"><span offset-key="3d8ad1c5ae584cfe8807b2496e1d5d19:0">R</span>***emember to keep positive because the interviewers are always looking for constructive answers.***</span>

> <span key="e27756939ff54abc8b33676fba21ae09">***‚ö´You can specify cutting edge collaboration tools and techniques and/or methodologies that you already know the company employs in their own workflows.***</span>

> <span key="c5838628c3a546b78541e48c4e51594d">***‚ö´For the least favorite parts, don‚Äôt just list the downsides and failures, but also mention what you‚Äôve learned from it and how you would improve.***</span>

> <span key="51db20a75cde41089213eb4cf5116f4d">***‚ö´ Ensure that you come across humbled from the failures, not exasperated and that you know better than everyone else‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääeven if you truly feel this way! Explain how you tried to positively encourage your team to correct the course rather than staying silent and going with a consensus majority.***</span>

## 

<span key="d07b7fb619dc46b986de949d5e5a5e77">***3. Based on the project, what programming languages / tools / services did you use? And why did you choose them?***</span>

> <span key="55fa2ea322d4449eb9d9254e636157cc">***‚ö´ Questions like this are designed to allow you to showcase your way of thinking. The interviewer is looking to hear your ability to make choices based on rational decisions‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääso make sure that you show that you can do this!***</span>

> <span key="80f32afecc5a4ad1919b7a84c45ee4f3">***To begin with, give an example of a project in which you had the most ownership or you had the greatest sense of achievement/efficiency/effectiveness from the toolchain used.***</span>

> <span key="f3bd9b4af1684c7eaeae229d2a87b6b9">***‚ö´ Next, describe the goal of the project, and briefly go through your responsibilities when it came to the toolchain decision-making process. Within Agile work practices, it‚Äôs usually a team effort to decide the best programming languages/tools/services are the best fit for the project, within customer requirements. Outline the consultation process you went through with both the customer and your team to arrive at the best solutions.***</span>

## 

<span key="1c4f103fef7c4ed8bc44591570fe5e17"><span offset-key="1c4f103fef7c4ed8bc44591570fe5e17:0">4. Describe the biggest toolchain-related challenge you encountered in the project:</span></span>

> <span key="8fcccfc4611d42c28446660d452fa9b3">***‚ö´Outline the situation, the goal you expected, and the reason why there was a challenge.***</span>

> <span key="f8cd02f151ba4c3d89fe37d1bd7fbb15">***‚ö´Share the toolchain you used when you encountered the problem, then other technologies and tools you applied to help solve it, if applicable. Ensure to note whether there was a full tool pivot or you managed to build onto an existing library (or something similar) to achieve the end goal.***</span>

> <span key="6f3049a6151c4964b6816dbb66168a21">***‚ö´Remember: the most important thing is not what you ultimately used, but how many options you referred to during the process, and which metrics you adopted to decide which tech to go for. Remember to share the pros and cons of your decision, and if, looking back now, whether you would do it differently.***</span>

## 

<span key="a13ba52971d848d0ad8c228e19ab977a"><span offset-key="a13ba52971d848d0ad8c228e19ab977a:0">5. How would you design this system for scale?</span></span>

> <span key="9d926fb5b101447cb42b16e14f8417fd">***‚ö´First of all, the interviewer would like to know the traffic level we‚Äôre expecting: 1,000, 100,000, or 10 million users per second? Think about the data expectations for each system user, database connections (blocking/nonblocking actions), downtime specifics, and cloud considerations (if any).***</span>

> <span key="e5f12a4756564a4cabb44a07a4a5a0a2">***‚ö´List the potential problems that might occur when trying to scale. Different traffic levels may have different problems, so make sure you think this through, and decide the priorities of the problems that you should solve. Many codebases are not built for scale, so note code changes that might need to occur, rather than just infrastructure expectations.***</span>

> <span key="8188c8862ecc4ff9b6d30e82452892f5">***‚ö´Different traffic levels may have different system architectures. List the options you think best fit your scenario and explain why you choose them. Many apps utilize a stripped-back product (which can be achieved through system architecture) when high traffic levels affect systems, rather than crashing the product completely or users experiencing unacceptable wait times.***</span>

## 

<span key="6bc569cf62d543a287662fe2b29e94e2"><span offset-key="6bc569cf62d543a287662fe2b29e94e2:0">6. Testing: What is your process to test a code when developing a software or application? How do you decide the scope of your test case?</span></span>

> <span key="f98996c2204946e88b81ef8d0486feb8">***‚ö´First, do your groundwork to ensure that you thoroughly understand the different testing types. Do you know your unit testing from your regression testing from your user acceptance testing? If you need to brush up, check out this great resource.***</span>

> <span key="d986fbcbba504c9abfc5569d5501a6d3">***‚ö´Once you‚Äôve got that on lock, it‚Äôs time to share a project that you‚Äôve tested thoroughly before.***</span>

> <span key="966d250163ea47b885c71d26b1d1449c">***‚ö´Remember to separate the project into different sections. Each section should apply the testing type that fits its characteristics. Describe the goals of different testing types, and also introduce the library/service you used for the test. (For bonus points: explain the pros and cons of the library/service and whether it was your decision to choose that particular suite.)***</span>

> <span key="3154891103914a8698dfa4cf10f18047">***‚ö´It makes sense at this point to include documentation (and particularly inline documentation) you use that helps clarify functions/issues so that testing goes smoothly.***</span>

> <span key="709e4c02226c4a4cafcfae60cbac59e1">***‚ö´You may also mention a project you were involved in where testing was not well conducted and how you would‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääor did‚Ää‚Äî‚Äägo about fixing the issues.***</span>

## 

<span key="f7a9f2d1613846dab096c9b9307b18d8"><span offset-key="f7a9f2d1613846dab096c9b9307b18d8:0">Monitoring</span></span>

## 

<span key="b0fa263c3e274824ad7f787fabc0e70d"><span offset-key="b0fa263c3e274824ad7f787fabc0e70d:0">7. What kind of tools / services do you use for logging? What kind of data will you log? And what‚Äôs the next step when you get the log?</span></span>

> <span key="44253d9bb6cc431aac3a1e8e0565f37b">***‚ö´Time for some details! When answering this question, give an example of a project that you‚Äôve monitored before.***</span>

> <span key="771048a43e7746e2a839475a1f1cc650">***‚ö´Explain what information you logged and what questions it answered.***</span>

> <span key="2f4094ff22d74d45974cf0f318fee9bc">***‚ö´Please do not just describe the data format but also give the reason why you decided to extract this data.***</span>

> <span key="b446029c1a14471ab91f5fcc3db6174b">***‚ö´Describe the reporting process and any associated tools used.***</span>

> <span key="bf9d881e897f452c89d7acafb4ff5867">***‚ö´Some questions to think about to help you structure your answer, and nail your response:***</span>

<span key="b6873b905ef64fa89634409588b465c3"><span offset-key="b6873b905ef64fa89634409588b465c3:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="f5e6465c946640ed93d38ad7355d32c3"><span offset-key="f5e6465c946640ed93d38ad7355d32c3:0">What to avoid</span></span>

> <span key="3b89603f0d094c8984953569f96f0037">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="3b89603f0d094c8984953569f96f0037:1">Complaining about having to handle the problem</span></span>

> <span key="5ea65d3432684bfcb67f9521f17725f1">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="5ea65d3432684bfcb67f9521f17725f1:1">Showing how annoyed you were at the problem</span></span>

> <span key="8c52dd8bf6d64fe89688305033b08a0d">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="8c52dd8bf6d64fe89688305033b08a0d:1">Pointing fingers at others for the problem</span></span>

> <span key="35dfb7211cb84c90a206a5ef947b9778">***‚ö´***<span offset-key="35dfb7211cb84c90a206a5ef947b9778:1">Talking ill of your bosses or coworkers</span></span>

> <span key="e273810d019645ac8d2dd13e6fd7edcf">***‚ö´*Keep in mind that your interviewer is not only trying to get a glimpse of your past, but to gain an understanding of how you might react to challenges should they hire you. Therefore, when you‚Äôre choosing your scenario, try to pick one that may be applicable in your new work setting as well.**</span>

<span key="237ec44a357548628c3bbbcc09f82c6e"><span offset-key="237ec44a357548628c3bbbcc09f82c6e:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="4234b69753464fc0bca60d0941b11626"><span offset-key="4234b69753464fc0bca60d0941b11626:0">NOW; Here‚Äôs some for you guys to answer in the comments!</span></span>

### 

<span key="80c3b1049b5d4c8e99f7a278653ca31b"><span offset-key="80c3b1049b5d4c8e99f7a278653ca31b:0">8. Which logging services have you researched and used before?</span></span>

### 

<span key="a1b135321478402ea51ce97c23f58909"><span offset-key="a1b135321478402ea51ce97c23f58909:0">9. Why did you choose or look into each particular logging service?</span></span>

### 

<span key="699e30a238e54f629c79f4ce35c639fb"><span offset-key="699e30a238e54f629c79f4ce35c639fb:0">10. Was your decision because of the scale, the features, or the size of the community?</span></span>

### 

<span key="55d14ef5d0e341b18a272be327c8c2b5"><span offset-key="55d14ef5d0e341b18a272be327c8c2b5:0">11. In what scenarios did you check these logs? Was it scheduled daily/weekly/monthly or as an on-demand activity?</span></span>

### 

<span key="f6f64a60261044a9b5e166c64cded01a"><span offset-key="f6f64a60261044a9b5e166c64cded01a:0">12. What information would the data be transformed into? Was it for development, business, or customer decision-making?</span></span>

### 

<span key="9136ebf09713449bbcac4d853d4c18a5"><span offset-key="9136ebf09713449bbcac4d853d4c18a5:0">13. What information would the data be transformed into? Was it for development, business, or customer decision-making?</span></span>

<span key="dd2e1753abd74672a0ba17b058293253"><span offset-key="dd2e1753abd74672a0ba17b058293253:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">‚Äã</span></span></span>

Technical interview :

<a href="web-development-interview-part-3.html#heres-the-repo-that-i-use-to-practice-my-technical-chops-for-interviews" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

Here‚Äôs the repo that I use to practice my technical chops for interviews:

<a href="web-development-interview-part-3.html#1.-development" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

1\. Development

<a href="web-development-interview-part-3.html#2.-based-on-your-experience-in-this-project-specify-your-favorite-and-least-favorite-part-of-this-ty" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

2\. Based on your experience in this project, specify your favorite and least favorite part of this type of collaboration.

<a href="web-development-interview-part-3.html#3.-based-on-the-project-what-programming-languages-tools-services-did-you-use-and-why-did-you-choose" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-855088 r-dwliz8 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-lqms97 r-dnmrzs r-iphfwy r-1guathk r-1h8ys4a r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr r-7xmw5f"></a>

3\. Based on the project, what programming languages / tools / services did you use? And why did you choose them?
